SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss Jessica Schwartz’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope the world sees education as the basis of our society, a driving force of sociopolitical change and economic freedom…”

– Miss Jessica Schwartz, One Day Chapter Coordinator @FCASD https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/world-sees-education-basis-society-sociopolitical-change-economic-freedom/
